title: Freedom.apk
description:
With Freedom you will be able to purchase in game items for free on your Andriod device.it works with games that are not monitored such as Candy Crush.

I did not make this please See below. 

After activating the game with the freedom-app you can change it back to your language
Here is the compatibility game list: <a href="
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/lv?key=0Aoz9rJKp8kcHdE1SZV9ic2xUVV9fRmhiREVwYUZMSGc" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/lv?key=0Aoz9rJKp8kcHdE1SZV9ic2xUVV9fRmhiREVwYUZMSGc</a>
Privacy
Freedom is local solution, so all data it need is stored directly on your device. We don't collect any your private data. And yes, we can't say the same about Google.
Legal
This software is not a Crack. No services or software were damaged. Freedom doesn't interfere in work of Google servers.
Remember: Freedom launcher was made only for legally installed applications. You can use this application to get content, already included in these apps. Please do not pirate Google Play apps.

This app has no advertisements
Enjoy!!!

1. Install Freedom APK on your phone.
2. Install Market Unlocker on your phone.
3. (OPTIONAL)Change timezone to 4.00+ Moscow (Settings > More > Date and Time > Select Time Zone)
4. Open Market Unlocker
5. Tick: Enable Unlocker (dont worry about the other functions)
6. Swipe over to Market
7. Scroll until you find: Russian | MTS 25001
8. Open Freedom
9. Choose Game
10. Enjoy and seed!
